products.title: ThermoBlock Blackout Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: ThermoBlock Blackout Cream Electric Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our exclusive ThermoBlock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. 
 
A cream electric roller blind easily brightens up the space,  and our ThermoBlock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.   This cream blackout roller has a silver UV-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter,  a great option for hot offices or sunrooms. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more difficult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space.  Why not pair with our Smart Hub - control your blinds from the comfort of your phone while away, or pair with Amazon Alexa or Google Home Hub for a truly streamlined experience. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years' experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This cream electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2140 Fabric Colour: Cream Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Silver UV-Reflecting Thermal Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.productdescription:
The subtleness of this exquisite Isla PVC Blackout Whisper White electric roller blind adds just enough pretty interest to dress up a window. In the palest white with a leafy double-sided design it’s perfect to create a light and airy space. Ideal for a soft, feminine bedroom, a bathroom or to add a delicate focal point in a kitchen, this dreamy blind is made using a blackout fabric to keep daylight out when you need to and a safe, flame retardant finish. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.

products.productdescription:

products.metadescription: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey/Pink. Made to measure from £163.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This stylish Japanese inspired design features a soft wash of grey with hints of white and touches of pink to give it the perfect balance of pastel colour. Little blossom sits on delicate branches giving this an air of peace and tranquillity. Ideal to dress up a light and airy room, gorgeous Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey roller blind is made from a luxurious blackout faux silk and treated with Pollergen™, a unique fabric treatment that neutralises pollen so helping to relieve hayfever symptoms. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £163.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
With a restful, Japanese floral pattern, this electric roller blind delivers an air of Zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches coloured in soft grey with hint of blue on a white background. Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. The blind is finished in a fabulous blackout faux silk fabric and it is Pollergen™ treated using a specialist finish that helps to relieve hayfever symptoms by neutralising pollen. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.
